cab.content: (This Document is the Property of His. Britannic IViajesty's Covernmeht)S E C R S TVOPERATIONS,From:- General Delme Radcliffe, Italy. To:- C.I.G.S., Yfar Office.Despatched 12.30 a.m. )) 13:12:17. Received 9.20 a.m. )10035 December 12th cipher.First Army. Slight artillery activity otherwise nothing to report.Fourth Army. In addition to actions reported in my telegram of this morning the enemy displayed some artillery activity on the whole front and in afternoon delivered another attack on Col Delia Berretta. Result not yet known.Third Army. Nothing special to report. About six inches of snow have fallen to-day at heights exceeding 4000 feet.
